data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I chose the CGI namespace since this module will probably be of
    best use to CGI applications although one could argue it could be
    used in any form-based user interface. Listman comes from "list
    manager" in short. It provides a frameworks to manage lists of
    persons by storing them in any type of database supported by DBI
    (well, it's one of the goals), by exporting the records for
    retrieval by a site administrator in the form of a CSV file.
